subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Ed Orgeron was fired as Mississippi’s coach Saturday, a day after the Rebels blew a game against their big rival to finish the season 3-9 and go without a victory in the conference for the first time since 1982.
snippet: Ed Orgeron was fired as Mississippi’s coach Saturday, a day after the Rebels blew a game against their big rival to finish the season 3-9 and go without a victory in the conference for the first time since 1982.
